items.definition: a weather condition with strong wind and heavy rain
not supporting any of the sides involved in an argument
unusual and strange, sometimes in an unpleasant way
designed or able to stick to a surface:
made of or covered with a substance that stays attached to any surface it touches
in a way that can be believed or trusted
happening or existing at the same period of time
a written record of historical events
something that someone says or writes officially, or an action done to express an opinion
having a dark, deep red colour
